name: Linguistic-analysis-resources
tagline: Collection of resources for analyzing linguistic data of various kinds
body:
### Welcome to Linguistic Analysis Resources

This website contains tutorials and links to various topics and tools that might aid in linguistic research.

If you have a suggestion for something that should be included, please email either Michael McAuliffe (michael.e.mcauliffe@gmail.com) or Blake Allen (allenblakeh@gmail.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
